name: Lendix SA
membership: Member of the Board of the European Crowdfunding Network (ECN) - Vice chair Lending
goal: Lendix (lendix.com) is continental Europe’s leading lending platform for small businesses, allowing its community of retail (over 30,000) and institutional investors to finance businesses who want to grow in Europe. Since launching in 2014, Lendix has lent more than €160M to more than 400 businesses globally.
interests: Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Information Society, Taxation
euInitiatives:
Capital Markets Union Package (in particular the initiative on Crowdfunding ECSP and Financial Technology (FinTech))
Digital Single Market Initiatives
Prospectus Directive
Data Privacy Directive
Payment Services Directive
